Cheeky and irreverent she worships the child within her even though she is the lady who everyone defers to. Under her hawkeye supervision the linen is always clean the tables are set on time and the dog is always bathed; but the stickler for such detail is one who cannot hide the huge smile that spreads across her face as the first rains come pouring down as she runs out carefree and unbound just like her spirit. She is the perfect woman one that you would take to meet your parents and Revlon adorns her with Charlie Gold the fragrance for the woman of the earth. The mass premium was launched in 1995 and is a delicate composition that strives to accentuate her unique perspective coloring her beliefs and cheering away her blues. A slight nudge of the Eau de Cologne on your skin is the perfect accessory for that special night out or for your best friends wedding.

Created with the modern woman in mind the opening note of Revlon Charlie Gold contains accords of succulent peach ripe apricot luscious plum zesty citrus and violet leaves. The shy heart note blossoms into accords of velvety rose and jasmine which cuddle with muguet freesia and the slight yet fragrant spice of cinnamon. A trail of soothing sandalwood cedarwood and powdery musk is left behind as the dry down fades away along with the scrumptious notes of caramel and a slight hint of mouth-watering vanilla. Charlie Gold is fittingly bottled in a simple flacon accentuating the amber potion within. The spicy yet light fragrance is fitting for any occasion; add an airy aura to your day with a spritz of this classic fragrance from Revlon.

The captivating charm and the fiery spirit of the woman of today is captured by the house of Revlon and imbued in the tones of Charlie Red a classic revisited and colored in contemporary hues. She is a woman who is feminine yet the spirit with which she tackles challenges and curveballs that life throws at her leave you open mouthed with admiration. The mass premium comforts her when she is most vulnerable and reinstates her faith in herself. If you are a lover of classic fragrances that linger in the air and colors you memory of a special day with family this Eau de Cologne is a tasteful addition to complete your outfit. The floral woody undertones of the perfume stand testimony to your smiles and tears throughout.

Invoking the timeless charm of luxurious irresistibility accords of delicious blackcurrant buds light orange flower violet leaf and nasturtium present you with a playful opening note that leaves you yearning for more. The exotic accords of ylang ylang commingle with the luscious red plum apricot in the middle notes as velvety rose soothing jasmine and Lily of the Valley spread their redolence in the heart which is the essence of the fragrance. As the fire dies down and a soothing sense of satisfaction spreads through the air light steps of tonka beans ambery and heliotrope flower steal a moment from eternity as the mouth-watering sweetness of vanilla lead you along the trail of the dry down. Launched in 1993 Revlon Charlie Red is presented in a tasteful flacon that is charming yet simple very much like the woman it adorns. Seal the memories of beautiful day and ease through life on the happiness that overpowers you with the mild company of Revlon Charlie Red EDC.

The classic elegance of Charlie wafts through the air as she delicately dabs her pulse points with Revlon Charlie Blue an inimitable aroma that has inspired devotion and adulation for more than four decades now. Launched in 1973 the Eau de Cologne has a plethora of florals within that lets loose a fine shower of essence on your senses. The mass premium fragrance has found its niche among a discerning audience for the different layers and textures that it possesses that ensures that every time you wear it the aura that envelops you is distinctly different.

Made for the woman who loves a touch of feminine delicacy in the scent that adorns her the opening notes of the fragrance contain accords of hyacinth pungent jasmine sweet gardenia galbanum and aldehyde. They fade away into the heart that hides accords of smooth Lily of the Valley geranium white lily jasmine violet and traces of spicy coriander. The alluring base leaves behind a deep sense of satisfaction with the smooth accords of powdery musk oakmoss vetiver and sandalwood. The dry down departs leaving behind the mouthwateringly yummy aroma of vanilla that leaves you wanting more. The simple glass flacon that holds Revlon Charlie Blue reiterates that minimalism can indeed be elegant. Make memories and hold them dear with the classic redolence of Charlie Blue.

The tall buildings are testimony to the path she chooses to take asserting her independence at every step and reaffirming her faith in herself. Long brisk purposeful strides take her downtown where she just sits by the window in her favorite cafe sipping the bitter brew and watching people scurrying by like ants all the while content in her ability to set the pace of her own life. For the urbane woman independent and affirmative Revlon presents the cheery notes of Charlie Urban Energy the fragrance of power self-respect and confidence. The mass premium wafts its lilting notes straight into the heart while you never realise how much a part of you the fragrance has becomes. Dab on the Eau de Cologne for that special date yo have been looking forward to and color those exquisite memories with it.

Launched in 2000 the freshness of the fragrance comes from the combination of zesty bergamot light accents of mandarin the sudden sourness of fresh grapes and tomato leaf in the opening notes. The heart notes have lilting accords of muguet orange flower rose and jasmine which rest on a deeply familiar and soothing base of sandalwood heliotrope and powdery musk. The deep purple of the light fragrance is bottled in a simple flacon that reflects its vivacity. Embrace the sensuality spilling out of you and lose yourself in the pulse of the city that stands witness to your exploits with Revlon Charlie Urban Energy.
